00046 void DateTimeTest::testproperty_Date()
00047 {
00048         DateTime dt;
00049         std::wstring date = L"Jan 15 2005";
00050         dt.Date(date);
00051         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( dt.Date() == date );
00052 }

00054 void DateTimeTest::testproperty_Time()
00055 {
00056         DateTime dt;
00057         std::wstring time = L"12:10Z";
00058         dt.Time(time);
00059         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( dt.Time() == time );
00060 }
00061 
00062 void DateTimeTest::testmethod_Clear()
00063 {
00064         DateTime dt;
00065         std::wstring time = L"12:10Z";
00066         dt.Time(time);
00067         std::wstring date = L"Jan 15 2005";
00068         dt.Date(date);
00069         dt.Clear();
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( dt.Time().compare(L"") == 0);
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( dt.Date().compare(L"") == 0);
00072 }
00073 
00074 void DateTimeTest::testmethod_GetCurrentDateTime()
00075 {
00076         DateTime dt = DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime();
00077 
00078         int year=-1;
00079         int month=-1;
00080         int day=-1;
00081         int hour=-2;
00082         int minute=-2;
00083         int second=-2;
00084         int nparsed=0;
00085 
00086         nparsed = swscanf(dt.Date().c_str(), L"%d-%d-%d", &year, &month, &day);
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nparsed == 3);
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( year > 2004 && year < 3000 );
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( month > 0 && month < 13 );
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( day > 0 && day < 32 );
00091 
00092         nparsed = swscanf(dt.Time().c_str(), L"%d:%d:%d", &hour, &minute, &second);
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nparsed == 3);
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( hour > -1 && hour < 25 );
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( minute > -1 && minute < 61 );
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( second > -1 && second < 61 );
00097 }
00098 
00099 void DateTimeTest::testmethod_Parse()
00100 {
00101         DateTime dt1 = DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime();
00102         std::wstring dateString1 = dt1.ToString();
00103         DateTime dt2 = DateTime::Parse(dateString1);
00104         std::wstring dateString2 = dt2.ToString();
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dateString1 == dateString2);
00106         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt2.IsUTC() == true);
00107         std::wstring dateString3(L"2005-12-25T10:13:45");
00108         DateTime dt3 = DateTime::Parse(dateString3);
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt3.Date() == L"2005-12-25");
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt3.Time() == L"10:13:45");
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt3.IsUTC() == false);
00112         std::wstring dateString4(L"2005/12/24T10:13:46Z");
00113         DateTime dt4 = DateTime::Parse(dateString4);
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt4.Date() == L"2005-12-24");
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt4.Time() == L"10:13:46");
00116         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dt4.IsUTC() == true);
00117 }
00118 
00119 void DateTimeTest::testmethod_ParseFail()
00120 {
00121         std::wstring dateString(L"This is a bogus time");
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(DateTime::Parse(dateString), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FormatException);
00123         // slighly less bogus time
00124         dateString = L"Jan 5 2005T10:13:45";
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(DateTime::Parse(dateString), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FormatException);
00126 }

00128 void DateTimeTest::FormatDateTest()
00129 {
00130         u_int32_t d = 22;
00131         u_int32_t m = 11;
00132         u_int32_t y = 1995;
00133         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(DateTime::FormatDate(y, m, d) == L"1995-11-22");
00134 }
00135 
00136 void DateTimeTest::FormatTimeTest()
00137 {
00138         u_int32_t h = 7;
00139         u_int32_t m = 6;
00140         u_int32_t s = 5;
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(DateTime::FormatTime(h, m, s) == L"07:06:05");
00142 
00143 }
00144 
00145 void DateTimeTest::FormatDateTimeTest()
00146 {
00147         u_int32_t d = 22;
00148         u_int32_t m = 11;
00149         u_int32_t y = 1995;
00150         u_int32_t h = 7;
00151         u_int32_t min = 6;
00152         u_int32_t s = 5;
00153         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(DateTime::FormatDateTime(y, m, d, h, min, s, false) == L"1995-11-22T07:06:05");
00154 
00155 }
